TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit CodeTypeDeclarationCollection extends System.Collections.CollectionBase

remarks.format:
## Remarks The CodeTypeDeclarationCollection class provides a simple collection object that can be used to store a set of <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration> objects.
## Examples The following example demonstrates how to use the CodeTypeDeclarationCollection class. The example creates a new instance of the class and uses several methods to add statements to the collection, return their index, and add or remove attributes at a specific index point.
